The Attribution Crisis

iOS 14.5 privacy changes broke traditional tracking, leaving barbers blind to their marketing ROI

Privacy changes eliminated reliable attribution tracking

Booking apps don't integrate with ad platforms

Square, Booksy, and Schedulicity operate independently from Facebook and Google Ads, creating data gaps.

ROI Blindness

Can't identify which ads generate bookings

Barbers waste 30-50% of their ad spend on campaigns that don't convert to actual appointments.

The BookingBridge Solution

Advanced attribution engine that connects every ad interaction to actual bookings

Privacy-Safe Tracking

Advanced models track the complete customer journey from first ad view to final booking.
